*{{cite book |last=Hatcher |first=William |last2=Martin |first2=J.D. |year=1998 |title=The Bahá'í Faith: The Emerging Global Religion |publisher=Harper and Row |location=New York |isbn=0-87743-264-3 |url=https://books.google.com/books?id=IZmkG1ASirgC}}
*{{cite book |editor-first=John R. |editor-last=Hinnells |year=1984 |title=A Handbook of Living Religions |edition=Paperback |publisher=Penguin |location=London, UK |isbn=0-14-013599-5}}
*{{cite web |last=Momen |first=Moojan |title=The Covenant and Covenant-Breaker |publisher=bahai-library.com |year=2003 |url=http://bahai-library.com/momen_encyclopedia_covenant |accessdate=2009-01-01}}
*{{cite journal |title=The Baha'i Faith 1957-1988: A Survey of Contemporary Developments |journal=Religion |last=Momen |first=Moojan |authorlink=Moojan Momen |last2=Smith |first2=Peter |year=1989 |volume=19 |doi=10.1016/0048-721X(89)90077-8 |page=63 |url=http://bahai-library.com/momen_smith_developments_1957-1988}}
*{{cite book |editor-last= Rabbani |editor-first=Ruhiyyih |year=1992 |title=The Ministry of the Custodians 1957-1963 |publisher=Bahá'í World Centre |isbn=0-85398-350-X |url=http://bahai-library.com/uhj_ministry_custodians |editor-link=Rúhíyyih Khanum}}
*{{cite book |author=Rabbani, R. |authorlink=Rúhíyyih Khanum |year=1969 |title=The Priceless Pearl |edition=Hardcover |publisher=Bahá'í Publishing Trust: 2000 |location=London, UK |isbn=1-870989-91-0}}
*{{cite book |author=Schaefer, U. |authorlink=Udo Schaefer |author2=Towfigh, N. |author3=Gollmer, U. |year=2000 |title=Making the Crooked Straight: A Contribution to Bahá'í Apologetics |publisher=George Ronald |location=Oxford, UK |isbn=0-85398-443-3 |ol=11609763M}}
*{{cite encyclopedia |last=Smith |first=Peter |authorlink=Peter Smith (historian) |encyclopedia=A concise encyclopedia of the Bahá'í Faith |year=2000 |publisher=Oneworld Publications |location=Oxford |isbn=1-85168-184-1}}
*{{Cite book |last=Smith |first=Peter |authorlink=Peter Smith (historian) |year=2008 |title=An Introduction to the Baha'i Faith |publisher=Cambridge University Press |place=Cambridge |isbn=0-521-86251-5 |ref=harv |url=https://books.google.com/books?id=z7zdDFTzNr0C}}
*Spataro, Francis C. (2003). ''Charles Mason Remey and the Bahá'í Faith.'' Tover Publications, Queens, NY 11427-2116. 2003 {{ISBN|0-9671656-3-6}}. *{{cite book |last=Stone |first=Jon R. (ed) |year=2000 |title=Expecting Armageddon, Essential Readings in Failed Prophecy |place=New York |publisher=Routledge |pages=269–282 |isbn=0-415-92331-X |url=https://books.google.com/books?id=XMnbqiSjKsMC}}
*{{cite book |author=Taherzadeh, Adib |authorlink=Adib Taherzadeh |year=1992 |title=The Covenant of Bahá'u'lláh |publisher=George Ronald |location=Oxford, UK |isbn=0-85398-344-5}}
*{{cite book |author=Taherzadeh, Adib |authorlink=Adib Taherzadeh |year=2000 |title=The Child of the Covenant |publisher=George Ronald |location=Oxford, UK |isbn=0-85398-439-5}}
*{{cite book |author=Universal House of Justice |authorlink=Universal House of Justice |editor=Marks, Geoffry W. |year=1996 |title=Messages from the Universal House of Justice, 1963-1986: The Third Epoch of the Formative Age |publisher=Bahá'í Publishing Trust |location=Wilmette, Illinois, USA |isbn=0-87743-239-2 |url=http://bahai-library.com/uhj_messages_1963_1986}}
*{{cite book |author=Warburg, Margit |authorlink=Margit Warburg |year=2004 |title=Bahá'í, Studies in Contemporary Religion |publisher=Signature Books |isbn=1-56085-169-4 |url=http://signaturebooks.com/2010/02/bahai-studies-in-contemporary-religion |access-date=2010-11-03 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150909202431/http://signaturebooks.com/2010/02/bahai-studies-in-contemporary-religion/ |archive-date=2015-09-09 |dead-url=yes |df= }}
==Further reading== *{{cite journal |last=Momen |first=Moojan |title=Marginality and Apostasy in the Baha'i Community |journal=[[Religion (journal)|Religion]] |volume=37 |issue=3 |pages=187–209 |publisher=[[Elsevier]] |date=2007-06-08 |url=http://bahai-library.com/momen_marginality_apostasy |issn=0048-721X |doi=10.1016/j.religion.2007.06.008 |id= |accessdate=2010-11-03 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20101006025351/http://bahai-library.com/momen_marginalitiy_apostasy |archivedate=6 October 2010 <!--DASHBot--> |deadurl=no}}
==External links== *[http://www.h-net.org/%7Ebahai/diglib/books/P-T/S/sohrab/wtab.htm Mirza Ahmad Sohrab. The Will and Testament of Abdul Baha, An Analysis.] *[http://bahai-library.com/sohrab_ferm Living Schools of Religion] Vergilius Ferm, ed. Ames, Iowa: Littlefield, Adams & Co., 1956. Chapter 19, "The Bahá'í Cause," by Mirza Ahmad Sohrab (pages 309-14) *[http://www.unitarianbahai.org/ Official Page of the Unitarian Baha'is] *[https://web.archive.org/web/20081120062722/http://www.charlesmasonremey.net/1960_proclamation.htm Proclamation of Mason Remey] – Remey's public declaration in 1960 *[http://www.bahai-guardian.com/ Orthodox Bahá'í Guardian] – Official website *[http://www.tarbiyatcenter.org Tarbiyat Bahá'í Community] – Official website *[http://www.bupc.org Bahá'ís Under the Provisions of the Covenant] – Official website *[http://freebahais.org Free Baha'i Faith] - Official website *[http://guardianshipofthebahaifaith.org Guardianship of the Bahá'í Faith – Jacques Soghomonian] – Official website *[http://bahai-library.com/uhj_mason_remey_followers Mason Remey and Those Who Followed Him] – Published by the Universal House of Justice, along with introductory statements. *[http://bahai-library.com/compilation_issues_study_bahai#s1, Issues Related to the Study of the Bahá'í Faith] – Extracts from letters written on behalf of the Universal House of Justice *[http://www.h-net.org/~bahai/diglib/books/A-E/C/Chanler/FGTD.htm From Gaslight to Dawn by Julie Chanler] New History Foundation, NY 1956.
